data.name: Human
data.description:
The Alliance - Human [Q]
Units:
+5% attack rate

Buildings:
+1 armor
+5% attack rate

Upgrades:
+3Lv Unit Armor

Magic:
Holy Light (Instantly heals unit for 100 HP)
Blizzard (Deals 100 damage in 200 AoE)
Resurrection (Revives one unit)

Traits: Jacks of all trades but masters of none. Very basic and simple, but versatile and adaptive. Good in every situation, foolproof and idiotfriendly. Easy to play and very boring. Recomended for total Noobs.

Difficulty: Beginer

bonuses.name: Templar Order [W]
bonuses.description:
Unlocked upgrades:
+1 level of Animal War Training

Reduces spell damage to Footman, Crossbowman, Mage and Knight by 20%, increases their hit points by 25 and armor by 2

Type: Anti Magic / Unit Power

bonuses.name: Pegasus [F]
bonuses.description:
Unlocked upgrades:
+1 level of Storm Hammers

Pegasus replaces Gryphon Rider
Air Unit
+250 HP
+16 damage
+4 armor
+10% attack rate
Abilities:

(50% to deal 400 extra damage)
(Affects air units only)

(+35% AS for 10 sec)

Steel Swords
Steel Armor
Animal War Training
Storm Hammers

bonuses.name: Elite Knights [S]
bonuses.description:
Unlocked upgrades:
+1 level of Devotion Aura

Gives 30/50/70% chance that Knight will dismount when his horse is killed. Unmounted Knight has the same damage and health but reduced evasion. It can use Critical Strike and Devotion Aura upgrades.
(can be upgraded inside this building)

Type: Mid Game Push / Unit Power

bonuses.description:
Your heroes will receive a random item for hero kill by them or your units and every 4 level. Items can combine into many combinations. You can sell random items to free up inventory slots.

towerUpgrades.name: Critical Strike
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: bonus damage on each attack
Affects: Footman and Knight

Lv1: 10% to do 2.5x damage
Lv2: 20% to do 2.5x damage
Lv3: 30% to do 2.5x damage
Lv4: 40% to do 2.5x damage

towerUpgrades.name: Defend
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: chance to block an attack, bonus HP/sec
Affects: Footman

Lv1: 10% chance and +2 HP/s
Lv2: 20% chance and +4 HP/s
Lv3: 30% chance and +6 HP/s
Lv4: 40% chance and +8 HP/s

towerUpgrades.name: Storm Hammers
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: area damage on each attack
Affects: Gryphon Rider
(affects organic units only)
(does not affect Special unit)

Lv1: 20% to do 50 damage in 150 AoE
Lv2: 40% to do 60 damage in 175 AoE
Lv3: 60% to do 70 damage in 200 AoE
Lv4: 80% to do 80 damage in 225 AoE

spells.name: Visual Gryphon Hammer
spells.description: Adds visual effect.

towerUpgrades.name: Advanced Ballistics
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: bonus damage and attack rate
Affects: Crossbowman and Ballista

Lv1: +4 and +12 damage, +5% attack rate
Lv2: +8 and +24 damage, +10% attack rate
Lv3: +12 and +36 damage, +15% attack rate
Lv4: +16 and +48 damage, +20% attack rate

towerUpgrades.name: Devotion Aura
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: bonus armor to nearby units
Affects: Knight

Lv1: +2 armor in 400 AoE
Lv2: +4 armor in 500 AoE
Lv3: +6 armor in 600 AoE
Lv4: +8 armor in 700 AoE

towerUpgrades.name: Animal War Training
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: bonus hit points and attack rate
Affects: Knight and Gryphon Rider

Lv1: +25 hit points, +5% attack rate
Lv2: +50 hit points, +10% attack rate
Lv3: +75 hit points, +15% attack rate
Lv4: +100 hit points, +20% attack rate

towerUpgrades.name: Explosive Shot
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: chance to deal AoE dmg
Affects: Arrow Tower

Lv1: 15% to deal 30 dmg in 125 AoE
Lv2: 30% to deal 40 dmg in 150 AoE
Lv3: 45% to deal 50 dmg in 175 AoE
Lv4: 60% to deal 60 dmg in 200 AoE

towerUpgrades.name: Inner Fire
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: extra dmg and armor buff
Affects: Mage
(affects non-Hero units only)

Lv1: +5% damage, +1 armor
Lv2: +10% damage, +2 armor
Lv3: +15% damage, +3 armor
Lv4: +20% damage, +4 armor

spells.name: Mana Shield (1)
spells.description: Activates a shield that absorbs 0.75 damage per point of mana.

spells.name: Inner Fire 1
spells.description: Increases unit damage by 5% and armor by 1

towerUpgrades.name: Call to Arms
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: extra unit in each wave
Affects: All Barracks
(can capture neutral buildings)

Lv1: has Liquid Fire (deals damage over time)
10/20/30/40 damage/sec for 10/12/14/16 seconds
(affects buildings only)
Lv2: has Endurance Aura (bonus attack rate)
+4%/+8%/+12% in 700 AoE
Lv3: has Critical Strike (bonus damage on attack)
10/20% chance to x2.5/x3.5 damage
Lv4: has Inspiraton Aura (bonus damage)
+15% damage in 700 AoE
(doesn't affect Special unit)

heroes.name: Holy Paladin
heroes.description:
Hero Unit (Melee)
Strong Vs All Units
Weak Vs Buildings

Role: Tank

Can learn:
War Stomp (Damage Spell)
175-325 damage, 2.5-4s stun
(250-400 area of effect)
(30 second cooldown)

Holy Light (Healing Spell)
200-500 HP to 3 units
(25 second cooldown)

Divine Shield (Self Spell)
6-12 sec near invulnerability
(35 second cooldown)

Resurrection (Summoning Spell)
revives 4-10 dead units
(60-120 second cooldown)

skills.name: War Stomp - [Level 5]
skills.description: Slams the ground, dealing <AOws,DataA4> damage to nearby enemy land units and stunning them for <AOws,Dur4> seconds.

skills.name: Holy Light - [Level 4]
skills.description: Heals up to 3 units for 200 hit points.

skills.name: Divine Shield - [Level 1]
skills.description: An impenetrable shield surrounds this unit, protecting it from all damage and spells for 6 seconds.

skills.name: Resurrection - [Level 1]
skills.description: Brings back to life the corpses of 5 friendly nearby units.

heroes.name: Grand King
heroes.description:
Hero Unit (Melee)
Strong Vs Heroes
Weak Vs All Units, Buildings

Role: Assassin

Can learn:
Thunder Clap (Damage Spell)
175-325 damage, 10-22% slow
(250-400 area of effect)
(30 second cooldown)

Critical Strike (Passive Skill)
27-45% to do 4x damage
(affects Heroes only)
(doesn't affect Special unit)

Masterful Parry (Self Spell)
blocks all attacks for 2 sec
(15-9 second cooldown)

Colossus Scream (Disable Spell)
4-7 sec stun
(if enemy Hero is close, gives -6-18 armor to them)
(doesn't affect Special Unit)
(30 second cooldown)

skills.name: Thunder Clap - [Level 4]
skills.description: Slams the ground, dealing <AHtc,DataA4> damage to nearby enemy land units and slowing their movement by <AHtc,DataC4,%>% and attack rate by <AHtc,DataD4,%>%.

skills.name: Defiled Reaction - [Level 1]
skills.description: Gives a 100% chance to avoid an attack.

skills.name: Divine Shield - [Level 1]
skills.description: An impenetrable shield surrounds this unit, protecting it from all damage and spells for 6 seconds.

skills.name: Blizzard - [Level 4]
skills.description: Calls down 1 freezing ice shard wave; each wave deals <AHbz,DataB4> damage to units in an area.
